#include <stdio.h>
int main()
{
    int a,b,x,y,r1,r2,c;
    scanf("%d%d",&a,&b);
    
    while(a>0 || b>0)
    {
        x=a;
        y=b;
        while(x>0 && y>0)
        {
            r1=x%10;
            r2=y%10;
            if((r1+r2)>9)
            {
                c++;
            }
            x/=10;
            y/=10;
        }
        switch(c)
        {
            case 0:printf("No carry operation.\n");
            break;
            case 1:printf("1 carry operation.\n");
            break;
            default:printf("%d carry operations.\n",c);
        }
        c=0;
        scanf("%d%d",&a,&b);
    }
}
